description: AI Agent automation tasks for Gettysburg Community (GimmeDat) platform

tasks.title: Set up AI service integration layer
tasks.description: Create a reusable AI service abstraction in the backend that supports multiple LLM providers (Claude API as primary). This is the foundation all other AI agents will use. Create: app/services/ai_service.py with provider abstraction, config entries for API keys, and a simple test.
steps: Create app/services/ai_service.py with async Claude API client wrapper
Add AI-related config entries to app/config.py (ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, AI_MODEL, AI_MAX_TOKENS)
Add anthropic SDK to requirements.txt
Create tests/unit/test_ai_service.py with mock tests
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Content Moderation AI Agent
tasks.description: Replace the keyword-based ModerationService with an LLM-powered content classifier. The agent should analyze listings, messages, and reports for policy violations (scam, harassment, spam, inappropriate content) and return structured verdicts with confidence scores. Keep keyword matching as a fast pre-filter, add AI as a second pass.
steps: Read current app/services/moderation_service.py to understand existing logic
Create app/services/ai_moderation_service.py with LLM-based content analysis
Define ModerationVerdict schema (violation_type, confidence, reasoning, action)
Integrate into listing creation flow (app/api/v1/listings.py) as optional second pass
Integrate into message sending flow (app/api/v1/messages.py)
Add auto-triage logic to report creation (app/api/v1/reports.py)
Create tests/unit/test_ai_moderation.py
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Customer Support Chatbot Agent
tasks.description: Create a RAG-powered support chatbot backend endpoint and upgrade the existing frontend chat component. The bot should answer FAQs using platform docs (terms, privacy, how-it-works) as context, and escalate complex issues to admin.
steps: Create app/services/chatbot_service.py with RAG pipeline (load docs, embed, query)
Create app/api/v1/chatbot.py with POST /chat endpoint
Add chatbot route to app/main.py router
Read existing frontend src/components/chat/ to understand current UI
Upgrade frontend chat component to call the new /chat API endpoint
Create a knowledge base loader that indexes terms, privacy, how-it-works pages
Add escalation logic (if confidence < threshold, flag for admin)
Create tests/unit/test_chatbot_service.py
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Smart Search & Discovery Agent with pgvector
tasks.description: Add semantic search capabilities alongside existing PostgreSQL full-text search. Use pgvector for embedding storage and similarity queries. Add recommendation and similar-listing endpoints.
steps: Add pgvector to requirements and create Alembic migration for vector column on listings
Create app/services/embedding_service.py for generating and storing embeddings
Create app/api/v1/search.py with semantic search endpoint
Add /recommendations endpoint based on user favorites and view history
Add /listings/{id}/similar endpoint for similar listing suggestions
Create an ARQ worker task to batch-generate embeddings for existing listings
Update frontend search components to use semantic search
Create tests/unit/test_embedding_service.py
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Listing Quality & Optimization Agent
tasks.description: AI-assisted listing creation: auto-generate descriptions from photos/keywords, suggest titles, recommend pricing based on similar listings, auto-categorize, and score listing completeness.
steps: Create app/services/listing_optimizer_service.py with AI generation methods
Create app/api/v1/listing_assist.py with /suggest-description, /suggest-title, /suggest-price, /suggest-category endpoints
Add listing completeness scoring logic
Add route to app/main.py
Create frontend component for AI-assisted listing creation
Add 'Generate with AI' button to listing creation form
Create tests/unit/test_listing_optimizer.py
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Admin Intelligence Dashboard Agent
tasks.description: AI-powered analytics for the admin dashboard: anomaly detection, trend analysis, user risk scoring, automated weekly summaries, and predictive alerts.
steps: Create app/services/admin_intelligence_service.py with analytics methods
Create app/api/v1/admin_analytics.py with /trends, /anomalies, /risk-scores, /summary endpoints
Add scheduled ARQ tasks for periodic analysis
Create frontend admin dashboard widgets for AI insights
Add risk score display to admin user management page
Create tests/unit/test_admin_intelligence.py
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Smart Notification & Engagement Agent
tasks.description: AI-driven notification system: personalized digests, re-engagement campaigns, smart timing, listing expiry nudges with engagement stats, and price drop alerts for favorited items.
steps: Create app/services/smart_notification_service.py with personalized notification logic
Extend app/models/notification.py with digest preferences and engagement tracking
Create Alembic migration for new notification fields
Add ARQ scheduled tasks for daily/weekly digest generation
Create AI-generated email content using templates
Update frontend notification preferences UI
Create tests/unit/test_smart_notification.py
Verify all existing tests still pass

tasks.title: Build Multi-Campus Onboarding & Expansion Agent
tasks.description: Automated campus onboarding pipeline: self-service campus registration, AI-generated landing pages and SEO content, category customization, cross-campus analytics comparison.
steps: Create app/services/campus_onboarding_service.py with automated provisioning
Create app/api/v1/campus_onboarding.py with /onboard endpoint
Add auto-generation of campus-specific categories and settings
Create landing page content generator using AI
Add cross-campus analytics endpoints to admin
Create tests/unit/test_campus_onboarding.py
Verify all existing tests still pass
